title: Costera, Álava
text:
Costera or Opellora is a hamlet and located in the municipality of <a href="Ayala/Aiara">Aiara</a>, in <a href="%C3%81lava">Álava</a> province, <a href="Basque%20Country%20%28autonomous%20community%29">Basque Country</a>, <a href="Spain">Spain</a>. As of 2020, it has a population of 28.
Geography.
Costera is located 53km northwest of <a href="Vitoria-Gasteiz">Vitoria-Gasteiz</a>.
